```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

First we load the libraries we need:
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(summarytools)
```

# Loading the clean PBS survey data
We load the clean data:
```{r message=FALSE}
pbs <- read_csv("data_clean.csv")
```

Here is a clickable interface for searching, sorting, and viewing the clean data:
```{r}
view(dfSummary(pbs))
```
